reasoning: Schizoaffective disorder is less common than schizophrenia, with estimated incidence ~0.5-0.8 per 100k per year. Prevalence approximately 25 per 100k among those with mood/psychotic disorders combined. Lower confidence due to diagnostic variability and changing DSM criteria over time.
source: Narrow WE et al. (2002). Use of mental health services by persons with serious mental illness or substance use disorders. Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration
